    # Lattice: xyplot(y~x, data)

  * Tab-based autocompletion in Rstudio
  * Cool ggplot tricks:  
    # facet_wrap()
    # geom_smooth()

= [http://unm-r-programming.googlecode.com/files/R_group_18_Jan_2013.R 18 Jan 2013] =
